column5: Private bedroom available with a super comfortable queen bed with the essentials.. (mattress, pillow etc...). Guests will have their own private hallway bathroom en-suite with a shower. My room works for a single traveler or a couple. In case of pet allergies,I do have 2 dogs that are super affectionate and not aggressive at all. Centrally located 20 minutes to DFW Airport, 15 minutes to Cowboys Stadium and 30 minutes to either Downtown Dallas or Ft Worth.
column8: Private and Comfortable room in Home
